scripts.test:debug: set DEBUG=Y && set HEADLESS=N&& npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions='@demo'
scripts.test:demo: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=N&& npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions='@demo'
scripts.test:smoke: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=Y&& npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions='@smoke'
scripts.uat:demo: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=N&& npx wdio config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions='@demo'
scripts.uat:smoke: set DEBUG=N && set HEADLESS=Y&& npx wdio config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions='@smoke'
